title: Two Lairds One Lady
description: Two Lairds, One Lady, a single betrothal. Things are about to get interesting.In the beautiful Scottish Highlands, twin brothers, both heirs to the Lairdship of their fiefdom, secretly exchange identities. Sir Thayer Mac Court, knighted for his valor on the battlefield, but equally renown for his rakish repute, is desperate to avoid an arranged marriage to Lady Elspeth Mourney, the fiery head-strong daughter of the head of their rival clan. Yet, Thayer falls helplessly in love with Elspeth and now must convince his head-strong brother to switch back!For her part, Elspeth vehemently opposes the match, having unceremoniously chanced upon Thayer six years earlier. That fateful first encounter ended in a stolen kiss-and disaster! Will Elspeth succumb to the deep longings she feels for the man she believes to be her betrothed's brother? Will Thayer face his toughest conquest and win her heart?
author: John C.  Ryan
